<a id="MultiMeshInstance2D"></a>

# MultiMeshInstance2D

**Inherits:** [Node2D](Node2D.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Node that instances a [MultiMesh](MultiMesh.md) in 2D.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**MultiMeshInstance2D** is a specialized node to instance a [MultiMesh](MultiMesh.md) resource in 2D.

Usage is the same as [MultiMeshInstance3D](MultiMeshInstance3D.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

  </tbody>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="MultiMeshInstance2D_property_multimesh"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[MultiMesh](MultiMesh.md) **multimesh** [ðŸ”—](#MultiMeshInstance2D_property_multimesh)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_multimesh**\ (\ value\: [MultiMesh](MultiMesh.md)\ )
- [MultiMesh](MultiMesh.md) **get_multimesh**\ (\ )

The [MultiMesh](MultiMesh.md) that will be drawn by the **MultiMeshInstance2D**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiMeshInstance2D_property_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **texture** [ðŸ”—](#MultiMeshInstance2D_property_texture)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_texture**\ (\ )

The [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) that will be used if using the default [CanvasItemMaterial](CanvasItemMaterial.md). Can be accessed as ``TEXTURE`` in CanvasItem shader.
